senses.sense_definition: A person who believes in divine revelation.

examples.text: The <w>revelationist</w> argued that human reason alone is insufficient to understand the nature of God.
As a strict <w>revelationist</w>, he accepted the ancient texts as the ultimate authority over scientific observation.

senses.sense_definition: A person who makes a revelation.

examples.text: Many scholars have analyzed the apocalyptic texts attributed to John the <w>revelationist</w>.
The self-proclaimed <w>revelationist</w> gathered a crowd to hear his predictions about the future.
